ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: The canonical way to perform meta-analysis involves using effect sizes. When they are not available this package provides a number of methods for meta-analysis of significance values including the methods of Edgington, Fisher, Lancaster, Stouffer, Tippett, and Wilkinson; a number of data-sets to replicate published results; and a routine for graphical display.

The canonical way to perform meta-analysis involves using effect sizes. When they are not available this package provides a number of methods for meta-analysis of significance values including the methods of Edgington, Fisher, Lancaster, Stouffer, Tippett, and Wilkinson; a number of data-sets to replicate published results; and a routine for graphical display.

name: r-metap
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.1" %}

{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-metap
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  fn: metap_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/metap_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/metap/metap_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 20120428672d39dc15829c7e66850fc4350a34df290d48cef0b1cc78d13f7b82

build:
  noarch: generic
  number: 6
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-rdpack
    - r-lattice
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-rdpack
    - r-lattice

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('metap')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('metap')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://www.dewey.myzen.co.uk/meta/meta.html
  license: GPL-2.0-only
  summary: The canonical way to perform meta-analysis involves using effect sizes. When they are not available this package provides a number of methods for meta-analysis of significance values including the methods of Edgington, Fisher, Lancaster, Stouffer, Tippett, and Wilkinson; a number of data-sets to replicate published
    results; and a routine for graphical display.
  license_family: GPL2

  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2
extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
